desmoj.extensions.visualization2d.engine.command

Class Command

  • java.lang.Object
    • desmoj.extensions.visualization2d.engine.command.Command
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommandSyntax, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Command
extends java.lang.Object
    Command extends CommandFrame and implements execute(). Command is the connection to animation.model.

    • Field Summary

      • Command

        public Command(java.lang.String cmd,
               java.lang.String remark,
               Parameter[] parameter)
        Constructor for CommandFrame, used for template generation used by CommandFactory.createCommand(cmd, remark, parameter).
        Parameters:
        cmd - command-name
        remark - remark about template
        parameter - Array of Parameter's where each parameter must have a different type
